description:
Fate Graphite was born into a world where magical skills shape your destiny. His skill is Gluttony, a seemingly useless curse of unending hunger that has left him shunned and looked down upon. Until one day, after he takes the life of a thief, his true power awakens: he can devour the skill of anyone he kills to feed his appetite. Will he learn to control this gruesome ability for the better?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: จอมตะกละดาบคลั่ง

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Chimera
tags.description: Features a beast made by combining animals, usually with humans.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Cannibalism
tags.description: Prominently features the act of consuming another member of the same species as food.

node.description:
**[Website](https://everdre.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@EverdreaM_official) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EverdreOfficial)**

**EverdreaM** is a Japanese music duo consist of Misato ([Misato Matsuoka](https://anilist.co/staff/149680/Misato-Matsuoka)) and Hitomi ([Hitomi Sekine](https://anilist.co/staff/191744/Hitomi-Sekine)).
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.

__[Website](https://www.inametoru.com/) | [Blog (JP)](http://40meter.blog125.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/40mP) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/40meterP)__

__40meterP__, better known as 40mP, or alternatively known by alias Iname Tooru, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, arranger, composer, producer and illustrator. He uses the name 40mP when doing VOCALOID music composition, production and illustration, while as a singer-songwriter he uses the name Iname Tooru. 

His works usually exceed 100,000 views in average. His most popular songs are "Karakuri Pierrot" and "Ren'ai Saiban", both achieving over 10M views. He has produced the most #1 songs on the Weekly VOCALOID Ranking, with 27 songs. He also holds the record for the most songs to enter the Hall of Fame, with a total of 76 works. This producer has released work in the VOCALOID-P data series.
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.
